an4.118:4.1: “Mendicants, a faithful person of good family should go to see these four awe-inspiring places.
an4.118:4.3: Thinking, ‘Here the Realized One was born!’ this is an awe-inspiring place.
an4.118:4.4: Thinking, ‘Here the Realized One became awakened as a supreme fully awakened Buddha!’ this is an awe-inspiring place.
an4.118:4.5: Thinking, ‘Here the Realized One rolled forth the supreme Wheel of Dharma!’ this is an awe-inspiring place.
an4.118:4.6: Thinking, ‘Here the Realized One became fully extinguished in the natural phenomenon of extinguishment that has nothing left over!’ this is an awe-inspiring place.
an4.118:4.7: These are the four awe-inspiring places that a faithful person of good family should go to see.”
